rules.formula: AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Oil Field Services'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Digital Solutions'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND( ($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Turbomachinery & Process Solutions'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false )

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Digital Solutions'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Oil Field Equipment'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Oil Field Services'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Oil Field Equipment'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'TMS'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

AND( ($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_Business_CIR__c,'Turbomachinery & Process Solutions'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7

rules.formula: AND(Case_Record_Type__c = 'CIR', OR(AND(NOT(ISNEW()), GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c <> PRIORVALUE( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ), AND(ISNEW(), NOT( ISBLANK( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ), NOT( ISNULL( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ))),(!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"))), (!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"))),(!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"))))

AND( OR( AND( ($RecordType.Name="CIR"), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'closed') ,ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Resolved')) && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'open') ) ,AND(($RecordType.Name="SS_NPT"), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'closed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Resolved')) && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'open'))) ,(!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"))), (!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System")) ),(!(ISPICKVAL(Origin,"askDrilling System"))))

AND(($RecordType.Name="CIR"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'open'), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"OG_ECCR"), !ISPICKVAL(Origin,"TMS NC System"), !ISPICKVAL(GE_OG_EHS_Product_Safety_CIR__c, "No Impact"), GE_OG_CIR_EHS_Status__c=false)

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7

rules.description: This Rule triggers an email alert to billing when the case is pending billing.

rules.formula: AND(Case_Record_Type__c = 'MC-TS', OR(AND(NOT(ISNEW()), GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c <> PRIORVALUE( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ), AND(ISNEW(), NOT( ISBLANK( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ), NOT( ISNULL( GE_OG_Case_Update_CIR__c ) ))))

OR(AND($RecordType.Name='MCS - CS',ISCHANGED(MCS_Sub_Status__c)), AND(ISNEW(),RecordType.Name='MCS - CS'),AND($RecordType.Name='MCS - CS', ISCHANGED(IsClosed), IsClosed, MCS_SubstatusCurrntAge__c > 0))

rules.formula: AND( OR($RecordType.Name="Predix IPS",$RecordType.Name="Predix UO"), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Closed') ,ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Resolved')),OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Working'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Acknowledged'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') ))
